comments: The cyclic pattern (and numerator of the gf) is computed using Euclid's algorithm for GCD.
references: N. Dershowitz and E. M. Reingold, Calendrical Calculations, Cambridge University Press, 1997.
R. L. Graham, D. E. Knuth and O. Patashnik, Concrete Mathematics, Addison-Wesley, NY, 1994.
links: N. Dershowitz and E. M. Reingold, Calendrical Calculations Web Site
crossrefs: Note that 20 appears twice. Different from A005206, A060143.
author: _Mitch Harris_
